HOW MUCH COULD YOU GET IN YOUR NEXT STIMULUS CHECK?

Your payment will be based on your most recent tax return, either from 2020 or 2019. You can find your adjusted gross income on line 8b of the 1040 federal tax form.

You could receive a ${{totalStimulus}} stimulus payment.

You will likely not receive a stimulus payment.

Note: This calculation is based on the bill passed by the Senate. Details in the final bill may differ.
Source: American Rescue Plan Act of 2021
